items.sentence: Tom and Mary were planning to do that yesterday.
Tom and Mary were able to do that by themselves.

Tom and Mary have done that together many times.
Tom and Mary have been taking a lot of pictures.
Tom and Mary don't want to watch the same movie.
Tom and Mary don't do anything together anymore.
Tom and I've known each other since high school.
Tom and I were supposed to do that by ourselves.
The last time I saw Tom he was still in college.
The last time I saw Tom he was still a teenager.
The last time I saw Tom he was riding a bicycle.
The heat didn't seem to bother Tom in the least.
The cold didn't seem to bother Tom in the least.

Neither Tom nor Mary has much money in the bank.
